title: Help me please.
body: My accoubt has been constantly kicking me out saying that i have logged onto another computer. when i log back in, it says to reconnect to game when i NEVER even joined a game. I go onto lolnexus, and it says that im playing, but im obviously not. i ask my friend to check the friends list and see if im in a game , but he says no. WHATS GOING ON?!?!

replies.body:
Hey there,

It's possible your account may have been compromised in one way or another, please ensure your [computer is secure](https://www.malwarebytes.org/) and that you change all relevant passwords (Email, league account, etc).

I'd also recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) so that Player Support can investigate.
